name: enhanced-resolve
description: Offers a async require.resolve function. It's highly configurable.

scripts.lint: yarn run code-lint && yarn run type-lint && yarn run special-lint
scripts.fix: yarn run code-lint-fix && yarn run special-lint-fix
scripts.special-lint: node node_modules/tooling/lockfile-lint && node node_modules/tooling/inherit-types && node node_modules/tooling/format-file-header && node node_modules/tooling/generate-types
scripts.special-lint-fix: node node_modules/tooling/inherit-types --write && node node_modules/tooling/format-file-header --write && node node_modules/tooling/generate-types --write
